main event: A visual observation of two bright color-changing objects with blinking lights was reported at Tierra Amarilla AFS, N. Mexico on December 33, 1957.
interesting points: The sighting lasted for 3 minutes and was visual in nature., One object hovered and maintained a size of approximately 25 mm., The objects exhibited red colors and a low green blinking light., No visual contact was made during the intercept attempts., The incident required further evaluation, suggesting possible explanations including a balloon or aircraft.
sighted object: two bright color-changing objects with blinking lights
witness description: reported by T-Sgt. Wrigliam, who is noted as a reliable observer
